short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all the premium content so that Medium's feed only shows available articles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This nifty tool removes all the premium articles from your Medium home page and lets you discover articles you can read quickly.

Medium is continuing to increase its pay wall content, and I found myself spending more time looking for things to read than actually reading myself.
